pageProps.title: Best Practices for Using React Hooks in Your App
pageProps.metaDesc: React Hooks are a powerful feature introduced in React 16.8 that allow you to use state and other React features in functional components. They provide a more concise and intuitive way to write React code, and have become an essential tool for React developers. In this article, we will discuss best practices for using React Hooks in your app, including how to use useState, useEffect, useContext, useCallback, and useMemo.
